name: macOS Catalina 10.15.5, Security Update 2020-003 Mojave, Security Update 2020-003 High Sierra
available: macOS High Sierra 10.13.6, macOS Mojave 10.14.6, macOS Catalina 10.15.4

advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to cause a denial of service
advisories.description: A denial of service issue was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Jannik Lorenz of SEEMOO @ TU Darmstadt

advisories.impact: A sandboxed process may be able to circumvent sandbox restrictions
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved restrictions.

advisories.available: macOS High Sierra 10.13.6, macOS Mojave 10.14.6, macOS Catalina 10.15.4
advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to cause a denial of service
advisories.description: A denial of service issue was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Dor Hadad of Palo Alto Networks

advisories.impact: A malicious application could interact with system processes to access private information and perform privileged actions
advisories.description: An entitlement parsing issue was addressed with improved parsing.

advisories.impact: Inserting a USB device that sends invalid messages may cause a kernel panic
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved restrictions.

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted audio file may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved bounds checking.

cves.credit: Yu Zhou (@yuzhou6666) working with Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted audio file may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Yu Zhou (@yuzhou6666) working with Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to determine kernel memory layout
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved bounds checking.

cves.credit: Yu Wang of Didi Research America

advisories.impact: A local user may be able to cause unexpected system termination or read kernel memory
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Yu Wang of Didi Research America

advisories.impact: Importing a maliciously crafted calendar invitation may exfiltrate user information
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to leak sensitive user information
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Jianjun Dai of Qihoo 360 Alpha Lab

advisories.impact: An application may be able to gain elevated privileges
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: @jinmo123, @setuid0x0_, and @insu_yun_en of @SSLab_Gatech working with Trend Micro’s Zero Day Initiative

advisories.available: macOS Mojave 10.14.6, macOS High Sierra 10.13.6, macOS Catalina 10.15.4
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to break out of its sandbox
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved bounds checking.

cves.credit: Zhuo Liang of Qihoo 360 Vulcan Team working with 360 BugCloud (bugcloud.360.cn)

advisories.impact: A local attacker may be able to elevate their privileges
advisories.description: A validation issue existed in the handling of symlinks. This issue was addressed with improved validation of symlinks.

cves.credit: Zhongcheng Li(CK01) of Topsec Alpha Team

advisories.available: macOS High Sierra 10.13.6, macOS Mojave 10.14.6, macOS Catalina 10.15.4
advisories.impact: Opening a maliciously crafted PDF file may lead to an unexpected application termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved bounds checking.

cves.credit: Peter Nguyen Vu Hoang of STAR Labs working with Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Samuel Groß of Google Project Zero

advisories.available: macOS High Sierra 10.13.6, macOS Mojave 10.14.6, macOS Catalina 10.15.4
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved bounds checking.

cves.credit: Xingwei Lin of Ant-financial Light-Year Security Lab

advisories.available: macOS High Sierra 10.13.6, macOS Mojave 10.14.6, macOS Catalina 10.15.4
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.impact: An application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A race condition was addressed with improved state handling.

advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to leak memory
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.available: macOS High Sierra 10.13.6, macOS Mojave 10.14.6, macOS Catalina 10.15.4
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Xinru Chi and Tielei Wang of Pangu Lab

advisories.available: macOS High Sierra 10.13.6, macOS Mojave 10.14.6, macOS Catalina 10.15.4
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to determine another application's memory layout
advisories.description: An information disclosure issue was addressed by removing the vulnerable code.

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: An integer overflow was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Tao Huang and Tielei Wang of Pangu Lab

advisories.available: macOS High Sierra 10.13.6, macOS Mojave 10.14.6, macOS Catalina 10.15.4
advisories.impact: An application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

cves.credit: Zhuo Liang of Qihoo 360 Vulcan Team

advisories.available: macOS High Sierra 10.13.6, macOS Mojave 10.14.6, macOS Catalina 10.15.4
advisories.impact: An application may be able to cause unexpected system termination or write kernel memory
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Xinru Chi and Tielei Wang of Pangu Lab

advisories.available: macOS Mojave 10.14.6, macOS High Sierra 10.13.6, macOS Catalina 10.15.4
advisories.impact: A local user may be able to read kernel memory
advisories.description: An information disclosure issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.available: macOS High Sierra 10.13.6, macOS Mojave 10.14.6, macOS Catalina 10.15.4
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A logic issue existed resulting in memory corruption. This was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Xinru Chi and Tielei Wang of Pangu Lab

advisories.available: macOS High Sierra 10.13.6, macOS Mojave 10.14.6, macOS Catalina 10.15.4
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to determine kernel memory layout
advisories.description: An information disclosure issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.available: macOS High Sierra 10.13.6, macOS Mojave 10.14.6, macOS Catalina 10.15.4
advisories.impact: A local user may be able to execute arbitrary shell commands
advisories.description: An issue existed in the handling of environment variables. This issue was addressed with improved validation.

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to overwrite arbitrary files
advisories.description: A path handling issue was addressed with improved validation.

advisories.impact: A malicious website may be able to exfiltrate autofilled data in Safari
advisories.description: An issue existed in the parsing of URLs. This issue was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Dlive of Tencent Security Xuanwu Lab

advisories.available: macOS High Sierra 10.13.6, macOS Mojave 10.14.6, macOS Catalina 10.15.4
advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to gain root privileges
advisories.description: A permissions issue existed. This issue was addressed with improved permission validation.

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to modify protected parts of the file system
advisories.description: An access issue was addressed with improved access restrictions.

advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to cause arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to overwrite existing files
advisories.description: A validation issue existed in the handling of symlinks. This issue was addressed with improved validation of symlinks.

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to bypass Privacy preferences
advisories.description: An access issue was addressed with additional sandbox restrictions.

advisories.impact: A user may gain access to protected parts of the file system
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with a new entitlement.

advisories.impact: A file may be incorrectly rendered to execute JavaScript
advisories.description: A validation issue was addressed with improved input sanitization.

advisories.impact: An application may be able to gain elevated privileges
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved validation.

advisories.impact: A non-privileged user may be able to modify restricted network settings
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved restrictions.

advisories.impact: A person with physical access to a Mac may be able to bypass Login Window
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved restrictions.

advisories.impact: A malicious application may cause a denial of service or potentially disclose memory contents
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.available: macOS High Sierra 10.13.6, macOS Mojave 10.14.6, macOS Catalina 10.15.4
advisories.impact: An application may be able to gain elevated privileges
advisories.description: A race condition was addressed with improved state handling.

advisories.impact: A USB device may be able to cause a denial of service
advisories.description: A validation issue was addressed with improved input sanitization.

advisories.impact: A remote attacker may be able to cause unexpected system termination or corrupt kernel memory
advisories.description: A double free issue was addressed with improved memory management.
